div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.alt: Dr Noonan's Friday COVID-19 Response Update

h3.a: Dr Noonan's Friday COVID-19 Response Update

div.p: Versin en espaol a continuacin We have finished up the first week of new instruction, and the first full month of online instruction. It is amazing to reflect on how far we have come! Thank...

img.alt: Dr Noonan's Tuesday COVID-19 Response Update

h3.a: Dr Noonan's Tuesday COVID-19 Response Update

div.p: Dear FCCPS Families, Welcome back to school! I hope you all had a great spring break, albeit different, and you and your students feel ready for the challenge of new material. This week marks a...

img.alt: Huskies Kick Off New Content with Spirit

h3.a: Huskies Kick Off New Content with Spirit

div.p: All Henderson students and staff are invited to show their school spirit this week as post-spring-break kicks off the presentation of new content for the online learning. Spirit week themes...

Dr Noonan's Friday Update includes construction news on the new GMHS + Time Capsule! An update on the FY21 Budget amid COVID-19 economic downturn. And a new resource for ELA/Reading and Math! https://www.fccps.org/o/fccps/page/covid-19-plan?#april17

FCCPS Public Meeting Notice School Board Members: Greg Anderson, Susan Dimock, Laura Downs, Shannon Litton, Phil Reitinger, Shawna Russell, Lawrence Webb Electronic School Board Work Session, Closed Meeting & Special Meeting Tuesday, April 21 at 7:00 PM
Public comments: email gadellm@fccps.org Webstream: www.youtube.com/fccpsorg

Dr Noonan's Tuesday update concerns efforts to restore bits of 'normalcy' to the FCCPS family - a shift back to daily communications and annual celebrations. Plus considering the lessons from Hong Kong Intl High. https://www.fccps.org/o/fccps/page/covid-19-plan#april14eng

Mason's 2020 Summer Academy registration is online! Open to current Henderson 7th & 8th graders and Mason students. The last day to register is May 21, 2020. Check out the GMHS Summer Academy website page for everything you need to know and do in order to be all set for this summer -- https://gm.fccps.org/o/gmhs/page/2020-summer-academy
